Source.Name: boundary_
Source.Description: N load from point source dischargers in 2002, kg, Terziotti, 10-200.

Source.Name: nadp_kg
Source.Description: Wet deposition of inorganic nitrogen (ammonia and nitrate), kg, detrended to 2002, K. Savvas, USGS, 2006

Source.Name: is_km_01NLCD
Source.Description: Impervious surface area, square kilometers, NLCD01 based, Terziotti 12-2008

Source.Name: fert02_01nlcd
Source.Description: Nitrogen fertilizer on farmland 2002, kg - NLCD01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008

Source.Name: man02_01nlcd
Source.Description: Nitrogen in livestock waste 2002, kg - NLCD01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that were determined by statistically significant by the modeler. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Point Sources Nitrogen load from point source dischargers in 2002, kg, Terziotti, 10-200. Reported in kg. nadp_kg Wet deposition of inorganic nitrogen (ammonia and nitrate), kg, detrended to 2002, K. Savvas, USGS, 2006. Reported in kg. is_km_01NLCD Impervious surface area, square kilometers, NLCD01 based, Terziotti 12-2008. Reported in sqkm. fert02_01nlcd Nitrogen fertilizer on farmland 2002, kg - NLCD01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008. Reported in kg. man02_01nlcd Nitrogen in livestock waste 2002, kg - NLCD01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008. Reported in kg.
